# Add-MCDWinPEComponents

Source: `source/Private/Workspace/BootImage/Add-MCDWinPEComponents.ps1`

## Synopsis

Adds WinPE optional components to a mounted boot image.

## Description

Adds Windows PE optional components (packages) to a mounted WinPE boot image.
Handles both base packages and their language-specific counterparts. Uses
Add-WindowsPackage to add each component from the ADK WinPE_OCs folder.

## Parameters

| Name | Type | Mandatory | Pipeline | Description |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| MountPath | String | Yes | No | Path where the WinPE boot.wim is currently mounted. |
| Packages | String[] | Yes | No | Array of package names to add. Specify base package names without path or extension (e.g., 'WinPE-WMI', 'WinPE-PowerShell'). The function automatically adds the corresponding language pack (en-us) if it exists. |
| WinPEOCsPath | String | Yes | No | Path to the WinPE_OCs directory in the ADK installation. |
| Language | String | No | No | Language code for language packs. Defaults to 'en-us'. |

## Examples

### Example 1

```powershell
Add-MCDWinPEComponents -MountPath 'C:\WinPE\mount' -Packages @('WinPE-WMI', 'WinPE-PowerShell') -WinPEOCsPath 'C:\ADK\WinPE\amd64\WinPE_OCs'

Adds WMI and PowerShell components to the mounted WinPE image.
```
